name: ChkSem
short_description:
ChkSem is a static C++ code analyser.
This project allows ( for the moment ) to find useless includes and to find missing direct includes for helping programmers to clean C++ codes.
This can greatly reduce build time as well as for small solutions than huge solutions.
This tool is powerful, even if it is not finalized.
New versions will follow with a GUI and more treatment.
The project is written in Java to ensure cross-platform compatibility.
summary: C++ Static Analyser Tool; Reduce Your Build Time
